attributes.additional_details: Vote to stop insurance companies from automatically renewing home and car insurance policies, as this prevents people from shopping around and obtaining a better quote. This is in responce to me having debt collectors on my phone after I had moved home and the policy was taken out automatically by them after I had moved.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the insurance industry.  If you are petitioning for the Government to regulate the industry in this regard, please resubmit the petition making this clear.
